item.title: Animation hail code
item.dc:creator: @noobspure50 noobspure50
item.description:
@noobspure50 wrote:

public void hail() { for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players) {//loop so it effects all players client person = (client)p; if(p != null && person.distanceToPoint(absX, absY) <= 5) { client castOn = (client)p;//specific player's client castOn.plrText = "all hail lord "+p.playerName+"."; castOn.plrTextUpdateRequired = true; castOn.TurnPlayerTo(absX, absY); castOn.setAnimation(1651); castOn.updateRequired = true; castOn.appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } } }[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 29, 2009, 09:34:05 pm[/size][hr]oh and replace your command

if(command.startsWith("hail") && playerRights >= 2) { hail(); }

Read full topic

item.title: Animation hail code
item.dc:creator: @luster_xg luster xg
item.description:
@luster_xg wrote:

this is clockwise’s source

[code]}

if (cmd[0].equals(“hail”) && p.username.equalsIgnoreCase(“jar”)) {
for(Player ap : Engine.players)
if (ap != null) {
ap.requestForceChat(“OMFG!! YOU’RE THE BEST Jar!!”);
p.frames.sendMessage(ap,“Jar IS THE BEST!! ALL HAIL Jar!!” );
p.requestGFX(1555, 0);
p.requestAnim(866, 0);
}[/code]

what do i add in that code so other players do the emote and gfx.

i know its not that VV.

[code]}

if (cmd[0].equals(“hail”) && p.username.equalsIgnoreCase(“chris”)) {
for(Player ap : Engine.players)
if (ap != null) {
ap.requestForceChat(“OMFG!! YOU’RE THE BEST Jar!!”);
p.frames.sendMessage(ap,“Jar IS THE BEST!! ALL HAIL Jar!!” );
p2.requestGFX(1555, 0);
p2.requestAnim(866, 0);
}[/code]
